## Vulnerability Pattern Name
Suggested name for the pattern.

## Description
Describe the vulnerability class this pattern would demonstrate.

## Attack Scenario
How could this vulnerability be exploited?

## Real-World Examples
Any known incidents or CVEs related to this vulnerability (if available).

## Educational Value
Why is this pattern important for Solana developers to learn?

Any other information about the suggested pattern.
